document.full_text: wal-mart stores inc plans to buy a minority stake in chinese e-commerce company yihaodian, giving the world's largest retailer a stronger foothold online and in the fast-growing china retail market.
document.title: wal-mart to buy stake in china web shop yihaodian
lines_and_colors: wal-mart stores inc plans to buy a minority stake in chinese e-commerce company yihaodian, giving the world's largest retailer a stronger foothold online and in the fast-growing china retail market.
